main event: A civilian couple observed a round object surrounded by mist or smoke near Spartanburg, South Carolina on July 22, 1950.
interesting points: The object was about 200 feet in diameter and was at an altitude of around 2,000 feet.
The lower part of the object glowed and pulsed or flickered.
The object was reported to be moving at an estimated speed of 500-600 mph.
Other people in the area also reported seeing the object.
A newspaper article mentions two youths in Venice, California observing a saucer-shaped white object on July 26, 1950.
sighted object: round object surrounded by mist or smoke
photographs: no, the report does not include any photographs
